mapper.select:
SELECT pro_who, pro_cash, pro_actual_date, pro_date, pro_category, pro_content, pro_cash FROM profit
AND pro_category = #{category}
AND pro_actual_date BETWEEN #{actual_profit_start_date} AND #{actual_profit_end_date}
AND ( pro_who LIKE CONCAT('%', #{proSearchQuery}, '%') OR pro_content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{proSearchQuery}, '%') )
ORDER BY pro_actual_date DESC
, pro_cash DESC
, pro_cash ASC
, pro_who ASC
, pro_actual_date DESC
